description: Dashboard to display metrics relating to APC Smart-UPS devices

panels.description: The time seconds since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description:
The current internal UPS temperature expressed in
Celsius.

targets.query: SELECT mean("upsAdvBatteryTemperature") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "snmp.UPS" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "agent_host", "agent_host" fill(none)

panels.title: Temperature

panels.description:
The current UPS load expressed in percent
of rated capacity.
panels.title: UPS Load

panels.description:
The remaining battery capacity expressed in
percent of full capacity.
panels.title: Battery Capacity

panels.description: The elapsed time since the UPS has switched to battery power in seconds.
panels.title: Time On Battery

panels.description: The reason for the occurrence of the last transfer to UPS battery power.
panels.title: Battery Transfer Reason

panels.description: Indicates whether the UPS batteries need replacing.
panels.title: Battery Status

panels.description: The UPS battery run time remaining before battery exhaustion.
panels.title: Battery Uptime Remaining

panels.description: The current state of the UPS. If the UPS is unable to determine the state of the UPS this variable is set to unknown.
panels.title: Status

panels.description: The results of the last UPS diagnostics test performed.
panels.title: Self-test Result

panels.description: The UPS system's automatic battery test schedule.
panels.title: Self-test Schedule

panels.description:
The remaining battery capacity expressed in
percent of full capacity.
panels.title: Battery Capacity

panels.description:
The current UPS load expressed in percent
of rated capacity.
panels.title: UPS Load

panels.description: The total output active power of the UPS system in W. The total active power is the sum of phase 1, phase 2 and phase 3 power.
panels.title: Power Usage

panels.description: The current utility line voltage in VAC.
panels.title: Line Voltage

panels.description: The total output active power of the UPS system in W. The total active power is the sum of phase 1, phase 2 and phase 3 power.
panels.title: Power Usage

panels.description: The actual battery bus voltage in Volts.
panels.title: Battery Bus Voltage

panels.description: The total output active power of the UPS system in W. The total active power is the sum of phase 1, phase 2 and phase 3 power.
panels.title: Power Usage

panels.description: The current in ampres drawn by the load on the UPS.
panels.title: Ampere

panels.description:
The current internal UPS temperature expressed in
Celsius.
panels.title: Temperature

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp.UPS" WITH KEY = "agent_host"
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp.UPS" WITH KEY = "agent_host"

title: APC SmartUPS Dashboard
